comments.body: There are other parameter to find an existing VM using `get_vm` API such as `moid`, `uuid` and a helper parameter `use_instance_uuid`, it would be great if we can implement these parameters as well. This will make all guest module parameters equal and this module future proof.

Actually module is only to deploy the VM. Here check is required to find if VM with same name exists or not.  User can pass only Name of the VM to be created. Finding existing VM is not the use case for this module.
UUID & MoID required if I am re-configuring or doing any power Ops on Existing VMs.
